title: Woman accused in murder plot against husband out on bond in Bahamas
description: Lindsay Shiver is released on bond after being accused of conspiring to kill her estranged husband. Shiver wears an ankle bracelet and cannot leave the Bahamas, where authorities say the plot was hatched. NBC News’ Anne Thompson has more details.

title: Iraq bans media from using term ‘homosexuality’, says they must use ‘sexual deviance’
description: Iraq’s official media regulator on Tuesday ordered all media and social media companies operating in the Arab state not to use the term “homosexuality” and instead to say “sexual deviance,” a government spokesperson said and a document from the regulator shows.

title: Huge blast destroys factory near Moscow
description: Local authorities say over 50 people were injured in the blast with six in intensive care. They fear other victims may be trapped in the rubble of the Zagorsk optical-mechanical plant in Sergiev Posad.

title: The British Museum reaches settlement with translator whose work was used without permission
description: The British Museum reached a settlement with Yilin Wang after her translations of Chinese poetry by Qiu Jin were used in an exhibit without her permission.

title: Charity says mother and daughter kidnapped in Haiti have been released
description: An American nurse and her child were released nearly two weeks after they were kidnapped in Haiti, a nonprofit connected to the woman said. NBC News' Peter Alexander reports.

title: Arrests made after TikTok call for looting on London's busiest shopping street
description: Fears that stores on London's Oxford Street would be targeted by looters after messages were posted on social media, prompted a highly visible police presence.

title: Coup leaders in Niger grow increasingly defiant, U.S. officials losing hope
description: A top general involved in Niger's coup has refuses to guarantee the safety of President Bazoum, now being detained by rebels. Countries in the region are drawing up plans for a potential military intervention.

title: 3 guests dead after family lunch serves up wild mushrooms — and a mystery
description: A family lunch in Leongatha, Australia has sparked a homicide investigation after 3 guests died of suspected death cap mushroom poisoning. Host Erin Patterson was interviewed by police.

title: Amazon nations won't be stopping deforestation by 2030
description: Eight Amazon nations failed to agree on a common goal for ending deforestation, as touted by Brazil's President Da Silva but agreed to some  environmental goals.

title: American nurse and her child kidnapped in Haiti have been released, organization says
description: A nurse and her child, both Americans, were released nearly two weeks after they were kidnapped in Haiti, a nonprofit connected to the woman said Wednesday.

title: At least 9 dead in 'violent' fire at French vacation home for people with disabilities
description: Nine bodies have been found and two more people are feared dead after a fire erupted at a vacation home hosting adults with disabilities in France on Wednesday, local officials said.

title: At least 9 killed in a fire at a French vacation home for people with disabilities
description: At least nine people are dead after a fire erupted in a vacation home hosting adults with disabilities in France, local officials said.

title: Migrant rescues continue in the Mediterranean amid reports of 41 deaths in a shipwreck
description: 41 migrants died in a shipwreck last week in the central Mediterranean, Italy's Ansa news agency reported, citing accounts from survivors who reached the Italian island of Lampedusa.

title: Dozens injured by an explosion at a factory northeast of Moscow
description: Dozens of people were injured after a warehouse at an optical-mechanical factory exploded in a town northeast of Moscow, the regional governor said.

title: China’s consumer prices fall for the first time in 2 years, as fears of deflation grow
description: China reported inflation data for July that pointed to a modest improvement from June, promptingseveral economists to warn of growing risk of deflation

title: Miss Universe Indonesia contestants complain of sexual harassment
description: Six contestants of a Miss Universe Indonesia pageant have filed complaints with police accusing organizers of sexual harassment after they alleged they were subjected to topless “body checks”.

title: 41 dead in migrant shipwreck in central Mediterranean
description: Forty-one migrants died in a shipwreck last week in the central Mediterranean, the Ansa news agency reported on Wednesday, citing accounts from survivors who have just reached the Italian island of Lampedusa.

title: Australian police investigate 3 deaths possibly caused by toxic mushrooms
description: Australian police are trying to figure out how three people died and a fourth became critically ill after apparently eating wild mushrooms at a family lunch.
